<small>Also see: [[H6500]]</small>

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרָה‎</span>] **verb** ==bear fruit, be fruitful== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew 1, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרִי‎</span> = Biblical Hebrew; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פר‎</span> ***fruit***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***blossom, bear fruit***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pir'u***</u></abbr>, ***posterity***; compare also [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֵּירָא‎</span> Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fruit***, and [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZMG xii (1887), 604</sup>): — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרוּ‎</span> [[Exod.1.7|Exod 1:7]] 1 plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּפָרִינוּ‎</span> [[Gen.26.22|Gen 26:22]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְרֶה‎</span> [[Isa.11.1|Isa 11:1]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרֵה‎</span> [[Gen.35.11|Gen 35:11]], masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרוּ‎</span> [[Gen.1.22|Gen 1:22]] +; ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּרֶה‎</span> [[Deut.29.17|Deut 29:17]], feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּרִיָּה‎</span> [[Ezek.19.10|Ezek 19:10]]; [[Isa.17.6|Isa 17:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּרָת‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:80g»§ 80g</sup>; for \*<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּרַיַת‎</span> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 81</sup>) [[Gen.49.22|Gen 49:22]] (twice in verse); — 

**1.** of men and animals, [[Exod.23.30|Exod 23:30]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Gen.26.22|Gen 26:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); especially + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבה‎</span> [[Jer.3.16|Jer 3:16]]; [[Jer.23.3|Jer 23:3]]; [[Ezek.36.11|Ezek 36:11]]; [[Gen.35.11|Gen 35:11]]; [[Gen.47.27|Gen 47:27]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁרַץ‎</span> ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Gen.8.17|Gen 8:17]]; [[Gen.9.7|Gen 9:7]]; [[Exod.1.7|Exod 1:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרוּ וּרְבוּ וּמִלְאוּ וגו‎</span> [[Gen.1.22|Gen 1:22]]; [[Gen.1.28|Gen 1:28]]; [[Gen.9.1|Gen 9:1]]. 

**2.** of vine, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֶּפֶן פֹּרִיָּה‎</span> [[Isa.32.12|Isa 32:12]] ***fruitful vine***, so [[Ps.128.3|Ps 128:3]] (simile of wife); compare (in figurative of Israel) [[Ezek.19.10|Ezek 19:10]] in Messianic prediction [[Isa.11.1|Isa 11:1]] a shoot from his [Jesse's] roots ***shall bear fruit***; with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ראֹשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁרֶשׁ פ‎</span> figurative, [[Deut.29.17|Deut 29:17]] ***a root bearing gall*** (as its fruit); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְרוּ יֶשַׁע‎</span> [[Isa.45.8|Isa 45:8]] is dubious, read perhaps 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּפֶר‎</span> ***let*** earth ***be fruitful in salvation*** ([[BDB#Oort|Oort]] and others); ***Participle*** f., as substantive, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַפֹּרַיָּה‎</span> ***the fruit-bearer***, poetic for tree, [[Isa.17.6|Isa 17:6]] (compare [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָעִיף‎</span>] **2**); so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּן פֹּרָת‎</span> [[Gen.49.22|Gen 49:22]] (twice in verse) Joseph is ***son of a fruit-bearer***, i.e. a fruitful bough. 

**Hiph\`il 1.** ***cause to bear fruit***, 

**2.** ***make fruitful***, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> with accusative of man or people: 

**1.** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִפְרַנִי‎</span> [[Gen.41.52|Gen 41:52]] ([[BDB#E|E]]). 

**2.** in [[BDB#P|P]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִפְרֵתִ֫י‎</span> [[Gen.17.6|Gen 17:6]]; [[Gen.17.20|Gen 17:20]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵיתֵ֫י‎</span>-), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְבָּה‎</span> [[Lev.26.9|Lev 26:9]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַפְרְךָ וְיַרְבְּךָ‎</span> [[Gen.28.3|Gen 28:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֶּפֶר‎</span> [[Ps.105.24|Ps 105:24]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִנְנִי מַפְרְךָ וְהִרְבִּיתִךָ‎</span> [[Gen.48.4|Gen 48:4]]. 

**3.** ***shew fruitfullness, bear fruit*** ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:53c»§ 53 c, d, g</sup>): ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַפְרִיא‎</span> [[Hos.13.15|Hos 13:15]] (as if from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פרא‎</span>).
